data.comment: Erik Lambrechts starts the match. Zulte with the kick-off in Liege.
Jean-Luc Dompe heads in to make it 0-1 at Stade Maurice Dufrasne.
In the minute 41, Liege's Obbi Oulare has been booked in Liege.
Philippe Montanier (Liege) is making a first substitution, with Nicolas Raskin replacing Eden Shamir.
The first-half has come to a close in Liege.
In the minute 46, Erik Lambrechts blows to start the second-half. Liege with the kick-off.
Goal! Liege go level at 1-1 through Michel Ange Balikwisha in Liege.
Goal! A Jelle Vossen header gives Zulte a 1-2 lead in Liege.
In the minute 58, The home team have replaced Duje Cop with Mehdi Carcela-Gonz√°lez. This is the second substitution made today by Philippe Montanier.
Collins Fai (Liege) gets a yellow card.
Jackson Muleka is replacing Obbi Oulare for the home team.
In the minute 71, Damien Marcq (Zulte) has received a yellow card from Erik Lambrechts.
At Stade Maurice Dufrasne, Laurens De Bock has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The away team replace Damien Marcq with Abdoulaye Sissako.
In the minute 81, Jackson Muleka (Liege) nets with a header to make it 2-2 at Stade Maurice Dufrasne.
Jelle Vossen is booked for the away team.
Francky Dury is making the team's second substitution at Stade Maurice Dufrasne with Nikolaos Kenourgios replacing Jean-Luc Dompe.
Erik Lambrechts blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
